General.Name: Kraft Bank Asa
General.Description: Kraft Bank ASA provides refinancing of mortgages on loans and unsecured loans with and without collateral to individuals in Norway. It also offers deposit products and advisory services. Kraft Bank ASA was founded in 2016 and is based in Sandnes, Norway.

2.Name: Mr. Jonathan G. W. Sunnarvik
2.Title: Director of Bus. Devel., Support and Legal

3.Name: Mr. Sune Svela Madland
3.Title: Director of Customer & Marketing and CEO of Customers & Market
